items.title: Here's where the economy is starting to show 'K-shaped' bifurcation

items.title: Inflation rate hit 3.0% in September, lower than expected, long-awaited CPI report shows
items.description: The annual inflation rate as measured by the CPI was expected to be 3.1% in September, according to the Dow Jones consensus estimate.

items.title: Everyone is waiting for Friday's big inflation report. Here's what to expect
items.description: The Friday release of September's consumer price index report is pretty much the only game in town this month.

items.title: India to cut Russian oil purchases, U.S. to slash tariffs as they near trade deal: Indian media report
items.description: The India-U.S. trade talks collapsed earlier this year with New Delhi not agreeing to widen market access to its vast agricultural and dairy sectors.

items.title: This week's critical inflation report comes with a variety of doubts about the data
items.description: The September CPI report will command full attention from financial markets, even as some investors will view the data with a skeptical eye.
